bibl.title: Umm el-Dabadib, Roman Settlement in the Kharga Oasis: Description of the Visible Remains. With a Note on ‘Ayn Amur. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The author visited the site as a tourist. The visible remains consist of a fort surrounded by a fortified settlement, a Northern settlement, scattered ruins, a necropolis and a subterranean aqueduct.
bibl.seg: ROSSI Corinna, Umm el-Dabadib, Roman Settlement in the Kharga Oasis: Description of the Visible Remains. With a Note on ‘Ayn Amur. Avec résumé en anglais.
The author visited the site as a tourist. The visible remains consist of a fort surrounded by a fortified settlement, a Northern settlement, scattered ruins, a necropolis and a subterranean aqueduct.
